content: <big><big><big>**old clem**</big></big></big> <big> the delicate flowers of our clematis affectionately referred to as old clem which we have growing in our backyard inspired this design the lace and movement of the stitches work together to create a lovely and pretty design </big> <big>these socks are a simple knit with the main challenge being a few five stitch cables the back of the leg is worked in stockinette stitch </big> <big>these socks are worked toe up and feature a rounded wedge toe with heel flap and gusset </big> **___** **___** <big>**pattern information**</big> <big>**sizing**</big> a-56 b-64 c-72 d-80 sts finished circumference approximately at a gauge of 36 sts 15 5 18 20 22 cm/6 25 7 8 9 inches to fit a foot circumference of 17 20 22 24 cm/7 7 75 8 75 10 inches at a gauge of 32 sts 17 5 20 22 5 25 cm/7 8 9 9 75 inches to fit a foot circumference of 19 5 22 25 27 5 cm/7 75 8 75 10 10 75 inches <big>**yarn**</big> 100g light fingering / fingering weight sock yarn solid semi-solid or tonal colourways would work well for this design <big>**gauge**</big> worked in the round and measured after washing and laying flat to dry 36 sts = 10 cm/4 inches over stockinette stitch the sock fit is similar to a stockinette stitch sock <big>**needles**</big> for working small circumference in the round 2 25 mm/us1 needles or size required to achieve gauge <big>**pattern formats** </big> the instructions for the construction of the socks are written and the central panel is both charted and written **low vision accessible** a low vision accessible version of this pattern are also available this version include 24 point arial all black text no italics no columns or tables and fully written instructions there are charts included but the charts are not needed to complete the pattern <big>**thank you**</big> thank you to zystus nj73551 edieglass helenmc andragroza bells5r1 edahel yarnymama trii2 and other testers a huge thanks also to yarnymama and yalta for their ongoing valued advice guidance feedback and encouragement
